title: Making a ranked team bronze3-silver5
body:
Hey guys, I've decided to make a new ranked team that has only bronze and silvers just for the fun :)
Add me if you're interested in joining

replies.body:
Hey Im climbing to silver currently in B2 i dont mind joining your team mainly here for season rewards and all not looking for serious Ranked 5
PM or add me if your interested{{item:2009}}

Hey this looks promising and could be a lot of fun, add me and let me know some more deets :)
p.s I main mid>top>jungle
Miischief add me, im a grewat jg!
Darsker, im S5, invite me to ur team m8 ^^ i can play anyrole, like sup>adc>top>mid>jungle ^^
Bronze 3 - silver 5.. It makes me laugh.. just put those down since Bronze and silver is at about same level.
Hey, I'm looking for a casual ranked team. With work I'm free for a game or two in the evenings. I main supp. Currently B1, but I've played in tournaments supporting Dia. Add me if you want.
ill give it a go if you will take me
